Package dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.utility

Class PlayerInventoryListener

java.lang.Object
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.utility.PlayerInventoryListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class PlayerInventoryListener extends Object implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
Listener class responsible for managing player inventory events. This class handles the removal of marked items from player inventories, particularly when players join the server. Implements Bukkit's Listener interface to handle specific events related to player inventory management.

  • Method Details

    • onPlayerJoin

      public void onPlayerJoin(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerJoinEvent event)
      Handles the PlayerJoinEvent by removing marked items from the joining player's inventory. This method is called automatically when a player joins the server.
      Parameters:
      event - The PlayerJoinEvent containing information about the joining player

    • removeMarkedItems

      public static void removeMarkedItems(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Removes items marked with specific keys from a player's inventory. Iterates through the inventory and checks each item for marked keys that should be deleted.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose inventory will be checked for marked items

    • isItemMarked

      public static boolean isItemMarked(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, org.bukkit.NamespacedKey key)
      Checks if an item is marked with a specific NamespacedKey. Used to identify items that should be removed from player inventories.
      Parameters:
      item - The ItemStack to check for marking
      key - The NamespacedKey to look for in the item's persistent data
      Returns:
      true if the item is marked with the specified key, false otherwise
